          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["The "],
              ["if-else-if", [["c"]]],
              [
                " ladder exits at the first success. That is, in the example above, if the value of "
              ],
              ["i", [["c"]]],
              [
                " is 0.5 then the first branch is executed. If the conditions overlap, the first criteria occurring in the flow of execution is executed. The other condition, which could also be true is ignored."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "bulleted_list",

                ", no other condition in that chain of blocks will be evaluated, and all corresponding blocks (including the "

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["An "],
              ["if", [["c"]]],
              [" condition can be expanded with an "],
              ["else", [["c"]]],
              [" block. The condition is checked "],
              ["once", [["i"]]],
              [" as above, and if it evaluates to "],
              ["false", [["c"]]],
              [
                " a secondary block will be executed (which would be skipped if the condition were "
              ],
              ["true", [["c"]]],
              ["). An example:"]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }

          "parent_id": "775f7112-1a48-4c9c-bd71-02e76a769f74",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["The condition "],
              ["i < 1", [["c"]]],
              [" is evaluated, and if it evaluates to "],
              ["true", [["c"]]],
              [" the block that follows is executed. If it evaluates to "],
              ["false", [["c"]]],
              [", the block is skipped."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
      "d8423dba-2504-4467-b78c-6b9d7bb754fe": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
